title: Add a non-email Contact page displaying site owner contact info

requirements.text: Add a new viewer-accessible "Contact" page that displays the site owner contact information (email address: brianlellis24@gmail.com) without any contact form or email-sending capability.

quotes: yes please add a non-email page that displays my contact info.

acceptanceCriteria: A new route exists for a Contact page (e.g., /contact) and it renders inside the existing AppLayout.
The Contact page clearly displays the email address "brianlellis24@gmail.com" as plain text and as a clickable mailto: link.
The Contact page does not include a form and does not attempt to send email from the app.

requirements.text: Add an in-app navigation entry point to the new Contact page from the global layout (footer is acceptable) so users can find it from anywhere in the app.

quotes: yes please add a non-email page that displays my contact info.

acceptanceCriteria: The footer includes a "Contact" link that navigates to the Contact page using the existing router navigation patterns.
The link is visible in both desktop and mobile layouts and matches the existing visual theme (colors/typography).

constraints: Do not implement any email sending/receiving features (no contact form, no backend email integration).
Respect the existing TanStack Router setup in frontend/src/App.tsx (add a new route rather than replacing the router).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
nonGoals: Adding a contact form or any workflow that sends messages to brianlellis24@gmail.com.
Adding third-party email services or integrations.
Adding new backend storage for messages.
